pr_title: Fixing build failures in docs pipeline build

timeline.message: Fixing build failures due to checkstyle issues in perf-test code, adding datalake to the codesnippets configuration, and temporarily removing two code snippets from JavaDoc for Netty and OkHttp due to build issues when they are present.

timeline.author: g2vinay
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -118,10 +118,6 @@ public NettyAsyncHttpClientBuilder connectionProvider(ConnectionProvider connect /** * Sets the {@link ProxyOptions proxy options} that the client will use. * - *

Code Samples

- * - * {@codesnippet com.azure.core.http.netty.NettyAsyncHttpClientBuilder#proxy}

replies.bodyText: Did you read the description of this PR? :)
replies.author: JonathanGiles

replies.bodyText: okay, I thought this was for perf framework style fixes only.
replies.author: g2vinay

replies.bodyText: I will look into why these codesnippets have issues. Maybe using the fully qualified package name for Type might help disambiguate.
replies.author: srnagar
